titleStmt.title: The examination of Francisco de Faria delivered at the bar of the House of Commons, Munday the first day of November. In the year of our Lord, 1680. Perused and signed to be printed, according to the order of the House of Commons, by me William Williams, Speaker.
titleStmt.author: Faria, Francisco de, b. 1653. aut
Williams, William c1634-1700, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Francisco de Faria.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.
